name: Yeshivat Lev Hatorah
description: Welcome to Yeshivat Lev Hatorah The Video Game! This game is an outlook into my experience at a place of learning in Israel. I learned a lot in this place and I truly appreciate my time spent there. For a fun experience please play this song on repeat while playing the game! i feel that it represents the Jewish experience one can have at this Yeshivah. LaYehudim
